summary: STATIONARY VEHICLE - DEALER COULDN'T ROTATE THE TIRES BECAUSE THE LUG NUTS WERE SWOLLEN. I WAS TOLD THAT I COULD BUY NEW LUG NUTS FOR $140.00. THE TECHNICIAN STATED THAT THERE IS A CLASS ACTION LAW SUIT AGAINST FORD FOR THE LUG NUT ISSUE.  POTENTIAL PROBLEM WOULD BE IF I HAD A FLAT WHILE ON THE ROAD AND COULD NOT FIX BECAUSE THE LUG NUTS WERE SWOLLEN, WHICH COULD CAUSE SAFETY ISSUE.
